item.title: It's been in use for many years, but the https://Help.OpenStreetMap.org website has had it's time. 🌇 🖬 For a few years, https://Community.OpenStreetMap.org has been the go-to place for OSMers to ask & answer questions. 🌅 The OSM Ops team (@osm_tech) will turn https://help.openstreetmap.org/ into read only mode on 1st March 2024. @osm_tech #OpenStreetMap #OSM https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/archiving-of-help-openstreetmap-org-1st-march-2024/108483

Do you develop open source software around OpenStreetMap? Would you like to take part in Google Summer of Code? Are you willing to be a mentor for students? We're looking for project ideas and mentors from OpenStreetMap’s open source software ecosystem. If you have suitable projects and/or are willing to mentor a contributor, please add to the 2024 Project ideas wiki page. https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/google-summer-of-code-2024-call-for-project-ideas-and-mentors/108515 https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Google_Summer_of_Code/2024/Project_ideas #OpenStreetMap #OSM #GSoC #FLOSS #OpenSource

Do you use the OSM API directly? Make an OSM App? We're dropping support for certain insecure, legacy authentication methods. If you're using them in your app, it risks breaking! _(If this is gibberish to you, you're probably not affected)_ OSM API will remove support for HTTP Basic Auth, & OAuth 1.0a. You'll have to migrate to the modern OAuth 2.0 feature, which is very well supported. read more: https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/oauth-1-0a-and-http-basic-auth-shutdown/108490 #OpenStreetMap #OSM cc: @osm_tech@osm.town
Later this year OpenStreetMap is 20 years old! Planning an OSM Birthday Party? Put it on the list! https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/OpenStreetMap_20th_Anniversary_Birthday_party

OpenStreetMap strives to be open & accessible to as many as possible, and remain independent. In 2020, the OSMF made a commitment that essential communications will always be accessible through an open, preferably self-hosted platform, i.e. accessible through open-source software and open protocols, and do not require an account at a third-party service to access. https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Commitment_to_Open_Communication_Channels #OpenStreetMap #OSM #open #OSMF

OpenStreetMap data is free, we only ask that you tell people about us in exchange¹. Some site use OSM without attribution, *and* hotlink to OSMF tile servers. 😭 Our data is free, but our servers cost time & money. 🖥 It's now even easier for you to report naughty sites like that. 📝 They can (eventually) be blocked from freeloading. We hope this will increase visibility of OSM! 👍 🎉 Read more: https://github.com/openstreetmap/tile-attribution/blob/main/README.md #OpenStreetMap #OSM ¹ to simplify the OSM licence req's.

DYK? OpenStreetMap Foundation (OSMF) is a UK based organisation, but it only “supports, but does not control” the OpenStreetMap project? 🙂 The OpenStreetMap project is hundreds of thousands of people all over the world, who are liberating maps, and controlling who & what gets mapped, and is larger than one “company limited by guarantee, in England and Wales” The OSMF supports the OSM project, but isn't the boss. 🙂 #OpenStreetMap #OSMF
Did you know? https://www.komoot.com/ is a Gold Corpoate Member of the OpenStreetMap Foundation. https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Corporate_Members #OpenStreetMap

Congratulations to our own Tom Hughes ( @tomh ) who made it on to the OpenUK (@openuk) New Year's Honours list, which recognises top UK open source influencers! 😍🥳🙇🗺🔎🏆👨🏻‍💻👏👏 Tom is one of the maintainers of the OpenStreetMap website. Both the software that you see in your browser, and the the hardward in the backend that keeps everything running. https://openuk.uk/2024-honours-list/ #OpenStreetMap

Free membership to the OpenStreetMap Foundation isn't just for mappers. If you do other OpenStreetMap work, you might qualify as an Active Contributor. Apply today with this form, explaining how you've helped the OSM Project. https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/active-contributor-membership/application-form-for-active-contributor-membership-other/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #geo #osmf

DYK? You can free membership to the OpenStreetMap Foundation! Just map 42 of the last 365 days, and you can get free membership through the Active Contributor programme! Read more here: https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/active-contributor-membership/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #geo #osmf

Do you use #OpenStreetMap as part of your job? Is your employer an OSMF Corporate Member? Here's how a company can join, and give back to the OSM project! https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Join_as_a_corporate_member #OSM #OSMF

🎉 Cheers to another year of mapping adventures! May your New Year be filled with exciting mapping challenges and successful contributions. Let's map a brighter future together! 🌐🚀 #OpenStreetMap #maps #gischat #map #geo #gis

Come visit the #OpenStreetMap stand at #37c3! /cc @gislars Photo of a large printer from an angle. Underneath is a OpenStreetMap banner.Side view of a printer showing a few stacks of square OpenStreetMap stickers, and flyers
Mappy Christmas! *(if it's your thing)* #OpenStreetMap #Christmas

Congratulations to @weeklyOSM for publishing their 700 issue! For years, the team of volunteers has published a weekly summary of what's happening in the OpenStreetMap world in many languages. Congrats! https://weeklyosm.eu/ #OpenStreetMap Logo, with weekly OSM on the left and a big 700 on the right!

The OSM Foundation has chosen its new round of officers. Guillaume Rischard (@grischard) is Chairperson, Roland Olbricht is Treasurer, and Craig Allan is Secretary 🔗 https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Board/Minutes/2023-12 #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF
The OpenStreetMap Foundation and the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team have signed a trademark license agreement, allowing HOT to use the “OpenStreetMap” name. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #HOT #hotosm

HOT (Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team) is joining the OSMF as a silver corporate member. https://www.hotosm.org/updates/exciting-milestones-reached-between-hot-and-the-openstreetmap-foundation/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #HOT #hotosm
Congratulations to Daniela (Dani) Waltersdorfer Jimenez, Guillaume Rischard (@grischard) and Roland Olbricht on being elected to the OSM Foundation Board at the AGM. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF
